questions: Which of the following is the most suitable title for the given paragraph?
How many powers does Thanos have according to this passage?
Give an example of metaphor used in the passage.
option-1: Thanos was born an ugly duckling .
option-2: Thanos grew up angry and jealous of his attractive and easy-going brother Starfox .
option-3: Thanos was exiled from his birthplace and forced to travel the universe.
answers: Thanos was born an ugly duckling .
